Project Experience

Cacino Style Dice Game

A simulated Dice Game that allows players and house to roll dices and win points • Feb, 2018 — May, 2018

This small project requires the knowledge of software architecture, thread, MVC desgin pattern, file read and write, UI desgin skills, and problem-solving skills.

  • All calls to the UI (update UI, create UI component) are done in the AWT Event Dispatch Thread
  • The rolling actions are more time-consuming, which should be run in background thread so they do not lock up the UI

Mini Network

A simulated social media that connects people with respect to relationships • Feb, 2018 — May, 2018

This project mimics social media app requires knowledge of javafx, HSQL database, JUnit Test, MVC pattern, serialisation, lambda expression.
